5#ifndef V8_HEAP_PARKED_SCOPE_H_
6#define V8_HEAP_PARKED_SCOPE_H_
7
8#include "src/base/platform/condition-variable.h"
9#include "src/base/platform/mutex.h"
10#include "src/base/platform/semaphore.h"
11#include "src/execution/local-isolate.h"
12#include "src/heap/local-heap.h"

14namespace v8 {
15namespace internal {
16
17// Scope that explicitly parks a thread, prohibiting access to the heap and the
18// creation of handles.
19class V8_NODISCARD ParkedScope {
20 public:
21 explicit ParkedScope(LocalIsolate* local_isolate)
22 : ParkedScope(local_isolate->heap()) {}
23 explicit ParkedScope(LocalHeap* local_heap) : local_heap_(local_heap) {
24 local_heap_->Park();
25 }
26
27 ~ParkedScope() { local_heap_->Unpark(); }
28
29 private:
30 LocalHeap* const local_heap_;
31};
32
33class V8_NODISCARD ParkedScopeIfOnBackground {
34 public:
35 explicit ParkedScopeIfOnBackground(LocalIsolate* local_isolate)
36 : ParkedScopeIfOnBackground(local_isolate->heap()) {}
37 explicit ParkedScopeIfOnBackground(LocalHeap* local_heap) {
38 if (!local_heap->is_main_thread()) scope_.emplace(local_heap);
39 }
40
41 private:
42 base::Optional<ParkedScope> scope_;
43};
44
45// Scope that explicitly unparks a thread, allowing access to the heap and the
46// creation of handles.
47class V8_NODISCARD UnparkedScope {
48 public:
49 explicit UnparkedScope(LocalIsolate* local_isolate)
50 : UnparkedScope(local_isolate->heap()) {}
51 explicit UnparkedScope(LocalHeap* local_heap) : local_heap_(local_heap) {
52 local_heap_->Unpark();
53 }
54
55 ~UnparkedScope() { local_heap_->Park(); }
56
57 private:
58 LocalHeap* const local_heap_;
59};
60
61class V8_NODISCARD UnparkedScopeIfOnBackground {
62 public:
63 explicit UnparkedScopeIfOnBackground(LocalIsolate* local_isolate)
64 : UnparkedScopeIfOnBackground(local_isolate->heap()) {}
65 explicit UnparkedScopeIfOnBackground(LocalHeap* local_heap) {
66 if (!local_heap->is_main_thread()) scope_.emplace(local_heap);
67 }
68
69 private:
70 base::Optional<UnparkedScope> scope_;
71};
72
73// Scope that automatically parks the thread while blocking on the given
74// base::Mutex.
75class V8_NODISCARD ParkedMutexGuard {
76 public:
77 explicit V8_INLINE ParkedMutexGuard(LocalIsolate* local_isolate,
78 base::Mutex* mutex);
79 explicit V8_INLINE ParkedMutexGuard(LocalHeap* local_heap,
80 base::Mutex* mutex);
81
82 ParkedMutexGuard(const ParkedMutexGuard&) = delete;
83 ParkedMutexGuard& operator=(const ParkedMutexGuard&) = delete;
84
85 ~ParkedMutexGuard() { mutex_->Unlock(); }
86
87 private:
88 base::Mutex* mutex_;
89};
90
91// Scope that automatically parks the thread while blocking on the given
92// base::RecursiveMutex.
93class V8_NODISCARD ParkedRecursiveMutexGuard {
94 public:
95 V8_INLINE ParkedRecursiveMutexGuard(LocalIsolate* local_isolate,
96 base::RecursiveMutex* mutex);
97 V8_INLINE ParkedRecursiveMutexGuard(LocalHeap* local_heap,
98 base::RecursiveMutex* mutex);
99 ParkedRecursiveMutexGuard(const ParkedRecursiveMutexGuard&) = delete;
100 ParkedRecursiveMutexGuard& operator=(const ParkedRecursiveMutexGuard&) =
101 delete;
102
103 ~ParkedRecursiveMutexGuard() { mutex_->Unlock(); }
104
105 private:
106 base::RecursiveMutex* mutex_;
107};
108
109template <base::MutexSharedType kIsShared,
110 base::NullBehavior Behavior = base::NullBehavior::kRequireNotNull>
111class V8_NODISCARD ParkedSharedMutexGuardIf final {
112 public:
113 ParkedSharedMutexGuardIf(LocalIsolate* local_isolate,
114 base::SharedMutex* mutex, bool enable_mutex)
115 : ParkedSharedMutexGuardIf(local_isolate->heap(), mutex, enable_mutex) {}
116 V8_INLINE ParkedSharedMutexGuardIf(LocalHeap* local_heap,
117 base::SharedMutex* mutex,
118 bool enable_mutex);
119 ParkedSharedMutexGuardIf(const ParkedSharedMutexGuardIf&) = delete;
120 ParkedSharedMutexGuardIf& operator=(const ParkedSharedMutexGuardIf&) = delete;
121
122 ~ParkedSharedMutexGuardIf() {
123 if (!mutex_) return;
124
125 if (kIsShared) {
126 mutex_->UnlockShared();
127 } else {
128 mutex_->UnlockExclusive();
129 }
130 }
131
132 private:
133 base::SharedMutex* mutex_ = nullptr;
134};
135
136// A subclass of base::ConditionVariable that automatically parks the thread
137// while waiting.
138class V8_NODISCARD ParkingConditionVariable final
139 : public base::ConditionVariable {
140 public:
141 ParkingConditionVariable() = default;
142 ParkingConditionVariable(const ParkingConditionVariable&) = delete;
143 ParkingConditionVariable& operator=(const ParkingConditionVariable&) = delete;
144
145 V8_INLINE void ParkedWait(LocalIsolate* local_isolate, base::Mutex* mutex);
146 V8_INLINE void ParkedWait(LocalHeap* local_heap, base::Mutex* mutex);
147
148 void ParkedWait(const ParkedScope& scope, base::Mutex* mutex) {
149 USE(scope);
150 Wait(mutex);
151 }
152
153 V8_INLINE bool ParkedWaitFor(LocalIsolate* local_isolate, base::Mutex* mutex,
154 const base::TimeDelta& rel_time)
155 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT;
156 V8_INLINE bool ParkedWaitFor(LocalHeap* local_heap, base::Mutex* mutex,
157 const base::TimeDelta& rel_time)
158 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT;
159
160 bool ParkedWaitFor(const ParkedScope& scope, base::Mutex* mutex,
161 const base::TimeDelta& rel_time) V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT {
162 USE(scope);
163 return WaitFor(mutex, rel_time);
164 }
165
166 private:
167 using base::ConditionVariable::Wait;
168 using base::ConditionVariable::WaitFor;
169};
170
171// A subclass of base::Semaphore that automatically parks the thread while
172// waiting.
173class V8_NODISCARD ParkingSemaphore final : public base::Semaphore {
174 public:
175 explicit ParkingSemaphore(int count) : base::Semaphore(count) {}
176 ParkingSemaphore(const ParkingSemaphore&) = delete;
177 ParkingSemaphore& operator=(const ParkingSemaphore&) = delete;
178
179 V8_INLINE void ParkedWait(LocalIsolate* local_isolate);
180 V8_INLINE void ParkedWait(LocalHeap* local_heap);
181
182 void ParkedWait(const ParkedScope& scope) {
183 USE(scope);
184 Wait();
185 }
186
187 V8_INLINE bool ParkedWaitFor(LocalIsolate* local_isolate,
188 const base::TimeDelta& rel_time)
189 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT;
190 V8_INLINE bool ParkedWaitFor(LocalHeap* local_heap,
191 const base::TimeDelta& rel_time)
192 V8_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT;
193
194 bool ParkedWaitFor(const ParkedScope& scope,
195 const base::TimeDelta& rel_time) {
196 USE(scope);
197 return WaitFor(rel_time);
198 }
199
200 private:
201 using base::Semaphore::Wait;
202 using base::Semaphore::WaitFor;
203};
204
205class ParkingThread : public v8::base::Thread {
206 public:
207 explicit ParkingThread(const Options& options) : v8::base::Thread(options) {}
208
209 V8_INLINE void ParkedJoin(LocalIsolate* local_isolate);
210 V8_INLINE void ParkedJoin(LocalHeap* local_heap);
211
212 void ParkedJoin(const ParkedScope& scope) {
213 USE(scope);
214 Join();
215 }
216
217 template <typename ThreadCollection>
218 static V8_INLINE void ParkedJoinAll(LocalIsolate* local_isolate,
219 const ThreadCollection& threads);
220 template <typename ThreadCollection>
221 static V8_INLINE void ParkedJoinAll(LocalHeap* local_heap,
222 const ThreadCollection& threads);
223
224 template <typename ThreadCollection>
225 static void ParkedJoinAll(const ParkedScope& scope,
226 const ThreadCollection& threads) {
227 USE(scope);
228 for (auto& thread : threads) thread->Join();
229 }
230
231 private:
232 using v8::base::Thread::Join;
233};
234
235} // namespace internal
236} // namespace v8
